languages.text: "Тише, Вортен. Охота и правда затянулась — блуждать по меняющимся тропам, довольствоваться мелкой дичью... Я начинаю скучать". {n}Ярость на лице Каллигоса сменяется унынием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Тише, Вортен. Охота и правда затянулась — блуждать по меняющимся тропам, довольствоваться мелкой дичью... Я начинаю скучать". {n}Ярость на лице Каллигоса сменяется унынием.{/n}

languages.text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тише, Вортен. Охота и правда затянулась — блуждать по меняющимся тропам, довольствоваться мелкой дичью... Я начинаю скучать". {n}Ярость на лице Каллигоса сменяется унынием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Quiet, Worten. The hunt really is taking too long. Wandering on changing paths, having to content ourselves with small game... I'm starting to get bored." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

"Quiet, Worten. The hunt really is taking too long. Wandering on changing paths, having to content ourselves with small game... I'm starting to get bored." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

"Quiet, Worten. The hunt is really taking too long. Wandering on changing paths, having to content ourselves with a small game... I'm starting to get bored." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

"Quiet, Worten. The hunt is really taking too long. Wandering on changing paths, having to content ourselves with a small game... I'm starting to get bored." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

"Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

"Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

languages.text: «Calla, Worten. Es verdad que la cacería se está prolongando demasiado. Vagar por senderos tornadizos, resignarnos a piezas menores... El tedio empieza a ser sofocante». {n}La furia de la expresión de Calligos se torna en desánimo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Calla, Worten. Es verdad que la cacería se está prolongando demasiado. Vagar por senderos tornadizos, resignarnos a piezas menores... Estoy empezando a aburrirme». {n}La furia de la expresión de Calligos se torna en desánimo.{/n}

languages.text: “安静，沃尔腾。这场狩猎确实拖得太久了。没完没了的林间小道，微不足道的糟糕猎物……这沉闷的一切让我窒息。”{n}卡里戈斯脸上的愤怒变成了沮丧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “安静，沃尔腾。这场狩猎确实太久了。我们在变化的道路上不断徘徊，不得不找些差劲的猎物来勉强满足欲望……我开始觉得无聊了。”{n}卡里戈斯脸上的愤怒变成了沮丧。{/n}

languages.text: « Silence, Worten. Il est vrai que cette chasse a trop duré. Nous passons notre temps à errer sur des chemins changeants où nous devons nous contenter de gibier insignifiant... C'est d'un ennui que je commence à ne plus supporter. » {n}La fureur de Calligos laisse place à l'abattement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Silence, Worten. Il est vrai que cette chasse a trop duré. Nous passons notre temps à errer sur des chemins changeants où nous devons nous contenter de gibier insignifiant... C'est d'un ennui que je commence à ne plus supporter. » {n}La fureur de Calligos laisse place à l'abattement.{/n}

languages.text: 「静かにしろ、ヴォルテン。狩りに時間がかかりすぎている。延々と曲がりくねった道に、わずかな獲物…息が詰まるほどに退屈なものだ」{n}カリゴスの怒りの表情が落胆に変わる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「静かにしろ、ヴォルテン。狩りに時間がかかりすぎている。変わりゆく道をさまよい、小さな獲物で満足しなければならない…そんなのは、そろそろ飽きてきた」{n}カリゴスの怒りの表情が落胆に変わる。{/n}

languages.text: "Still, Worten. Diese Jagd hat Euch wirklich eine ganze Weile beschäftigt. Die ständig neuen Pfade, das armselige Spiel ... Die Eintönigkeit von all dem ist erstickend." {n}Die Wut in Calligos' Gesicht weicht Enttäuschung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet, Worten. This hunt truly has dragged on for quite some time. The ever-twisting paths, the paltry game... The dullness of it all is suffocating." {n}The rage on Calligos's face changes to dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Still, Worten. Die Jagd dauert ohnehin schon zu lange. Auf sich verändernden Wegen wandeln, uns mit kleinem Wild zufriedengeben müssen ... Mir wird langsam langweilig." {n}Die Wurt auf Calligos' Miene weicht Enttäuschung.{/n}
